excited.description: Add an excited section. Valid values are low, medium, and high

emphasis.description: Add an emphasis modifier. Valid values are strong, moderate, reduced, none

date.description: Add a date modifier. Valid values are strong, moderate, reduced, none

address.description: Apply the address modifier to the selected text.

audio.description: Apply the audio modifier to the selected url to the audio file.

whisper.description: Apply the whisper modifier to the selected text.

cardinal.description: Apply the c|ardinal modifier to the selected text.

break ms.description: Enter a break tag using milliseconds

break strength.description: Enter a break tag using strength

voice en-US.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to en-US Alexa voices

voice en-UK.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to en-GB Alexa voices

voice en-AU.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to en-AU Alexa voices

voice en-IN.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to en-IN Alexa voices

voice de-DE.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to de-DE Alexa voices

voice es-ES.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to es-ES Alexa voices

voice it-IT.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to it-IT Alexa voices

voice ja-JP.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to ja-JP Alexa voices

voice fr-FR.description: Apply voice modifier and limit to fr-FR Alexa voices
